name: Nimble Jump
description:
Why did the Ninja jump over and over?

Why did the Kitten purr a lot?

Why did the Panda get black eyes?

FEATURES
- Collect over 30 pixel-art characters
- Jump over saws – endlessly hop forever
- Create your own characters
- Simple, pure, innovative gameplay
- Free to play and daily gift
